Sql.CDATA: IF EXISTS ( SELECT * FROM SYS.views WHERE name = 'v_GlobalINItemSiteHistDay' AND SCHEMA_ID = SCHEMA_ID('dbo') ) DROP VIEW [dbo].[v_GlobalINItemSiteHistDay] GO CREATE VIEW v_GlobalINItemSiteHistDay AS SELECT comp.CompanyCD, Hist.SDate, Hist.InventoryID, item.InventoryCD, item.Descr AS InventoryITemDescr, Hist.EndQty, Hist.SiteID, site.SiteCD, site.Descr AS SiteDescr, Hist.LocationID, location.LocationCD, location.Descr AS LocationDescr FROM INItemSiteHistDay Hist INNER JOIN Company comp ON Hist.CompanyID = comp.CompanyID INNER JOIN InventoryItem item ON Hist.CompanyID = item.CompanyID AND hist.InventoryID = item.InventoryID INNER JOIN INSite site ON Hist.CompanyID = site.CompanyID AND Hist.SiteID = site.SiteID INNER JOIN INLocation location ON Hist.CompanyID = location.CompanyID AND Hist.LocationID = location.LocationID WHERE Hist.CompanyID > 0
